channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Lunchtime News
channel.desc: The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Celebrity Catchphrase
channel.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts a celebrity special of the classic game show with Bill Bailey, Kathy Burke, and Gok Wan all trying to 'say what they see' in aid of charity.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Jeopardy!
channel.desc: Stephen Fry welcomes new contestants Alan and Katy as they take on the returning champion in the hope of claiming victory, but this is no average quiz show - this is Jeopardy! S1 Ep6.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Tipping Point
channel.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which three players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning a cash jackpot.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Chase
channel.desc: Toby from London, Becca from Marlow, Sophia from Liverpool and Neil from Manchester team up to take on the Chaser and hopefully leave with thousands of pounds.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Evening News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world, plus a focus on the stories that matter to you.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Emmerdale
channel.desc: Joe tries to bribe Clemmie, Billy is furious, and Ryan is taken aback.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh
channel.desc: The Walshes reach northern Thailand for the final leg of their trip as Barney arranges a great way to see the jungle - a roller coaster that is anything but average. S6 Ep6.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: For the Love of Dogs with Alison Hammond
channel.desc: Alison meets a rare Romanian Mioritic Shepherd with a fear of stairs and doorways, and there is chaos when a van with seven Belgian Shepherd cross puppies arrives. S13 Ep6.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Malpractice
channel.desc: Medical crime thriller series. The MIU turn their attention towards Dr Hernandez as James makes his own shocking discovery and unravels when a bullying complaint is made. S2 Ep3.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News at Ten
channel.desc: ITV News provides a fresh perspective on the major stories of the day with national and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Assembly
channel.desc: Jade Thirlwall faces a grilling from a collective of autistic and learning-disabled interviewers where no question is off the table and no subject out of bounds.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Martin Clunes' Islands of the Atlantic
channel.desc: Sao Tome and Principe and Bijagos Islands: Martin Clunes explores tropical Sao Tome and Principe and encounters some powerful women on the remote Bijagos Islands. S1 Ep1.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Shop on TV
channel.desc: Teleshopping.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Fake
channel.desc: Lanolin: The first episode of a gripping drama series. A magazine features writer thinks that she has found her perfect match when she meets a successful grazier on a dating app. S1 Ep1.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Unwind with ITV
channel.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Alan Titchmarsh's Gardening Club
channel.desc: Alan and the team share more gardening inspiration with a visit to the world-famous Hampton Court Gardens and an update from Martha Swales' kitchen garden. S2 Ep9.

channel.title: Good Morning Britain
channel.desc: News, current affairs and lively debate.

channel.title: Lorraine
channel.desc: Lorraine Kelly presents a topical mix of entertainment, discussion and showbiz glamour as well as the latest fashion, food and celebrity gossip.

channel.desc: Magazine show with news and topical items, celebrity guests, expert advice, real-life stories, competitions and a mix of cookery, health, beauty, lifestyle and more.
